t: What Is Lou & Grey (+ Why I Am This Brand's Biggest Fan) - It's Casual Blog
s: April 28, 2023 - We are devastated that we are no longer a freestanding business. Due to the pandemic, it was just not sustainable for LOFT company overall. Luckily, we are STILL a great brand, and you can find many wear to work pieces that were inspired by freestanding Lou & Grey under the LOFT label!
